replies.body:
> Play a PVP matchmade game with a summoner icon equipped

Implying theres a way to play _without_ a summoner icon?
It's a joke because April Fools
April fools without URF.... sad day
Sooo No chance at Zombie skins in the Birdie Bags {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I remember when they used to play a joke on april fools... but now they're asking you just to buy more things :(

wow your first 975rp skin in.. i don't even know how long. NOT EVERY SKIN IS WORTH 1350 YA KNOW

also.. where's urf? why give us all for one when you know what the people want. regular, no frills attached, urf.
I miss the times where the only emote everybody had was the urf, and it was able to be spammed constantly. I'd pay 3250rp for one of those.
Hextech skins are still better drop odds than anything decent to wear in PUBG.
Aww we don't get Birdie Capsule or Bag from missions. Hold on the missions are Entrees so does that mean that there will be more?
